item.title: GPT-4 Chat Demo
item.description: Attention The chat was saved to demonstrate how to ask GPT-4 questions and provide hints. The formula may be incorrect. Chat Text Could you estimate the average time a TCP request waits in the surge queue of an AWS CLB from CloudWatch metrics? To estimate the average time a TCP request waits in the surge queue of an Amazon Web Services (AWS) Classic Load Balancer (CLB), you can use the SurgeQueueLength and RequestCount metrics from Amazon CloudWatch.

item.title: Poe
item.description: poe.com/ Poe is a platform that enables users to access third-party chatbots, including ChatGPT. Poe can give suggestions on further questions the user could ask, and highlights terms that could be explained further by clicking on them.

item.title: New Bing
item.description: Based on GPT-4, New Bing is free to use but has a limit of 5 turns per session for unregistered users. You can use New Bing from the Edge browser or via the Bing app on mobile.

item.title: LLM Models
item.description: Open source models Chat Phi-4 Qwen-2.5 Reasoning QwQ Commercial models from OpenAI Chat GPT-4o Reasoning o3-mini o1 .

item.title: NGINX Proxy Cache
item.description: Checklist Do not cache sensitive content without authentication token included in proxy_cache_key. It is recommended to include a random secret in the string to further prevent hash collision attacks.

item.title: NGINX realip configuration for Cloudflare
item.description: If you also want to reject requests that does not come from Cloudflare: http { # Load realip module (if not already loaded) load_module modules/ngx_http_realip_module.so; # Include ...

item.title: OpenResty Lua linter
item.description: Tools Use lj-releng or luacheck to identify global variable references. Tips You can cache ngx to a local variable. local ngx = ngx Always include _VERSION in your module.

item.title: Upstream Keepalive
item.description: To enable keepalive connections to upstream, the keepalive directive must be included in upstream{} blocks, and in the location{} blocks you need to switch HTTP version to 1.1 and ...

item.title: Production App Servers for Node.js
item.description: NGINX Unit unit.nginx.org/ Phusion Passenger github.com/phusion/passenger PM2 github.com/Unitech/pm2 Since v6, PM2 supports Bun. HashiCorp Nomad github.com/hashicorp/nomad Hard to find tutorials on deploying multi-process Node.js app.
